data.title: Book review; GOOD VIBES GOOD LIFE; Vex King
data.meta_description: Vex King is a mind coach, a writer and a lifestyle entrepreneur who fuses his natural business acumen and a creative knack for the arts with the philosophical mindset, spiritual wisdom and faith in a…
data.text:
(Photography credits @Aridey179)

Name of the book: Good vibes, good life; how self-love is the key to unlocking your greatness.

Author: Vex King

Genre: Self-help book/motivational book

Publisher: Hay House Publishers (India) Pvt. Ltd.

First edition 2019

Eighth reprint 2020

Number of pages: 300

About the author

Vex King is a mind coach, a writer and a lifestyle entrepreneur who fuses his natural business acumen and a creative knack for the arts with the philosophical mindset, spiritual wisdom and faith in a positive attitude to achieve success.

As an optimist, visionary and philanthropist, Vex is the owner and founder of the Bon Vita lifestyle brand- a platform that delivers empowering perspectives, spiritual wisdom, practical solutions, inspirational stories, life lessons and more.

Vex King is using his positive influence to spread Good Vibes Only so that people can unlock their full potential and demonstrate greatness in all areas of their life.

Source: Good Vibes Good life (book)

The book design

The cover of the book is simple and appealing to the eyes. It is designed in a white base with golden letters. It is the size of an average palm-size, lightweight and compact to your bookshelf.

Description of the book

The book states all the basic processes of positive affirmations implementation, forward-thinking, career prospects analysis, emotional transformation, dealing with stress and inspirational words and quotes. In short, it is a motivational boost to the people who find a lack of intrinsic motivation.

The book is divided into sections, ‘Positive Lifestyle Habits’, ‘Making Yourself a Priority and ‘Pain and Purpose’. Every section has been designed to deal with and focus on the particular essence of self-transformation. The core aspects are body, mind and lifestyle.

Emotional enhancement is the key driving factor of this book and motivational triggers are added to make one step up on what one wants to achieve.

The 7 chapters

1.Matter of vibes

2. Positive lifestyle habits

3. Make yourself a priority

4. Accepting yourself

5. Manifesting goals: Mind work

6.Manifesting goals: Taking action

7. Pain and purpose

These 7 chapters have these basic lingering concepts: meditation, the law of attraction/vibration to the universe, affirmations and visualization.

The chapters are designed in a simple and free-flow way for the reader to get adapted and change consciously without pressure force.
